page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: With the ever increasing pressures of modern living many people seek recreation in quiet pastimes or physically demanding activities.Of outdoor pursuits gardening is most popular and catered for locally with 2 well stocked nurseries; Russells and Smiths.Some seek relaxation in angling ornithology; and walking while others prefer the more strenuous sports of jogging squash and golf.Indoor hobbies with all types of collections,stamps postcards and even plates.Many housewives enjoy leisure cookery and reading while their husbands make models and play chess and snooker. Most children enjoy participation sports; tennis and swimming. At home computer games are popular. Retired people prefer quiter pursuits; sewing and knitting.Teenagers enjoy discos and horse_riding at Baginton stables.
